q: '' Donald Rumsfeld says Bush invited him into the Oval Office just 15 days after the 9/11 attacks, when the focus was on targeting al-Qaeda in Afghanistan, and ordered a review of war plans for Iraq. Two weeks after the worst terror attacks in our nation's history, those of us in the Department of Defense were full occupied, writes Donald Rumsfeld . Yet Bush called for`` creative'' options to militarily engage Iraq. Donald Rumsfeld twice tried to quit in the wake of the Abu Ghraib scandal, which he says`` left me feeling punched

Allen Iverson 's old team improved to 16-5; his new-again team fell to 5-16. It was a positive experience to be part of AI returning, Nuggets coach George Karl said.`` I thought he fatigued as the game went on and we got the benefit of it. He's not in the best of shape yet.'' Eric Schmidt also took on Google's competition with Apple. Google partners with Apple, he said, on search, maps and YouTube. It competes, of course, on phones. Google also might in theory compete with Apple's Macintosh computer business with its Chrome OS hardware that Google hopes` to announce later this year,' Eric Schmidt said, Adam Lashinsky reports.''` Steve Jobs is absolutely brilliant,' said Eric Schmidt , referring to Steve Jobs , CEO of Apple, where Eric Schmidt was a longtime board member.'( He's) the most successful CEO in

Page replaces Google CEO Eric Schmidt , who will become executive chairman. In a blog post, Eric Schmidt said Page would`` merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly.'' I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! Eric Schmidt wrote.`` Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead.''
